original: 《 戰場 》戰鬥時，每隻部隊的場上士兵數：步兵上限 100人，騎兵上限 50人，象兵、車械，上限 25人。死亡時，會自動補上陣；直到統領武將傷亡、已分勝負、或出征士兵全數陣亡。
text: The number of soldiers on the field of each unit during the battle in "Battlefield":  the upper limit for infantry is 100, the upper limit for cavalry is 50, and the upper limit for elephant soldiers and vehicles is 25. Upon death, it will automatically make up for the battle; until the commander has casualties, the victory has been divided, or all soldiers on the expedition are killed.
